markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Fleet Tempo](/Feats.aspx?ID=3040) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Nantambu Chime-Ringer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=106)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3039)

</column>

---

To rush after a criminal or reach someone in need, you ring a sprightly tone. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.
name: Fleet Tempo
